div.p:
The xxiij day of September the yer' of gode jM vC and thre yeris
In presence of Johne mar' ane of the balyeis William scrimgeor
and Alexander sclatar Johne ramsay Oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to
Content and pay to Williame Rate lvj s' vusal money of scotland'
within xx dais hereftir follouing without ony excepcion fraude or
gile for the barrele of Salmond' aving to him be Johne of chamer

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die
Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit William scrimgeor
officiar' to pas' to Duncan crak and put the actis betuix him and
sere Androw Colisone tile execucioun or ellis bring thame
ane sufficient deforce

The saide day Jonhne mathesone offerit him redy to ansuer'
to Johne Cullane in ony thingis he hed' to say to him protestand'
for his costis and nicht tile ansuer quhil he be new warnit

The saide day thome lammyntone was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' patry rede forspekar for strubulance of Alexander prat in worde
and the saide Alexander quyt of al strubulance of the saide thomas

The said' day James Colisone grantit him redy to freitht
thome lammyntone of xiij s' at the handis of Alexander prat and offe
rit salt yrne wax or ony vthir pennyworthtis that he ples'
best to the saide Alexander for the pament of the saide xiij s' becaus'
he vndirstude he sulde freithe him tharof and the saide alexander refusit to tak
ony pennyworthtis

Eodem die gilbertus menyes deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander
prat erit Indempnis pro thoma lammyntone aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Idem gilbertus deuenit plegius quod dictus thomas erit
Indempnis pro dicto Alexandro aliter quam per viam Juris et dicte partes obligantur
per manus et bona ad conseruandum dictum gilbertum Indempnem de huismodi fideuissone

The saide day Jonhne of mydiltone was quyt of strubulance of thome lammynton'
in the court be ane Suorne assis' Alexander burnat forspekar

Eodem die Dauid Kintor deuenit plegius legalis quod Johnanes mydiltone erit Indempnis pro
thoma lammyntone aliter quam per viam Juris Et Alexander prat deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus thomas erit Indempnis pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per viam Juris

The saide day It was deliuirit be ane suorne assis' patry Rede forspekar that
Johne blak stabillar' sal mak his dikis Sufficient betuix him and Dauy
mar' quharthrow he be skathtles tharof according to resone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
p Vltimo die Septembris anno quo supra

the said' day the ballieis assignit monunday the ix day
of October' next to Cum to gilbert Wellis tile ansuer to
the borghe' fundin one him be Johne of Cullane that he
aw tile entirit tile his seruice or ellis ane mane for him
at michaelmes bigan Ande the saide Jhon' protestit for his
Costis and Skathis

The saide day the balyeis chargit the four sergeandis to Compele and
distrenye Duncan crak and mak penny of his gudis to the
vale of Sex s' and viij d' and mak sere Androw Colison be pait
and to put his persone within the tolbutht quhile he fynde Souerte
to vpmak the wair'stall and fulfill ale thingis contenit in the act
maid' tharupon' betuix this and monunday at x houris

The saide day Androw Couplande was fundin feit seruande to
Johne nicholsone be ane Suorne assis' Johne Colison'
forspekar abnd the said' Androw quyt of androw Johneson' clame

Eodem die Johannes ramsay deuenit plegius legalis quod gilbertus
Wellis erit Indempnis pro Johanne Cullane aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Johnanes Kintor deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis
pro prefato gilberto aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo
die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo quinqugesimo tercio quo die sectis
vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo Sectarum

Eodem die alexander menyes electus fuit in Officium prepositure pro anno Instanti
huius burgi prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas leslie Johannes mar Johannes Colisone et Johannes Ratre
electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno Instanti huius burgi prestitis solitis Juratis

Eodem die Andreas nachtj Willelmus scrimgeor gilbertus prestone et Normandus
leslie electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum huius burgi pro anno Instanti
prestitis Solitis Juramentis

The said' day the ballieis assignit the ix day of October' Instant to William
scrimgeor sergeand' to preiwe the deforce done be Duncane craik In the distrenyeing
of him for the thingis contenit in the actis maide betuix the said' Duncan and sere
Androw Colisone

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be James hill for the Wranguis
Occupacioun' of ane Croft of his without ony assedacioun' of him tharfor the balyeis
ordanit Androw nachtj sergeand' to tak ane distres of the saide knicht and lat it Agan to borghe'

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Kynnynmond' capellanus altaris
beate Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis situati et protesta
batur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex marcarum vsualis monete
Scocie sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore debito et non soluto de
quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum inter terram
ex orientali et Communes vias regias versus occidens et Austrum et terram
quondam dominj Andree henrici versus boream Ad quam terram precedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Johanne
fynne Johanne vschear' et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes arnot
minister domus Sancte trinitatis de Abidene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto loco
a longo tempore debito et non Soluto de quadam terra Jacente in
vico viridj Johanni litstar pertinentis inter Communionem venellam ex orientali et
terram quondam Johannis Durvarde ex occidentali et Communionem viam regiam versus
boriam ad quam terram nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio di
huius processus Testibus Alexandro brabner' Alexandro moresone et gilberto
prestone sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus Andreas Coupar collector capellanorum
chorj de Abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
sex s' dictis capellanis a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter Communionem venellam ex orientali
terram quondam Willelmi Durvarde ex occidentali et Communionem viam versus boreali Johanni
listar pertinentis Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo present in Curia tanquam die huius
processus Testibus Alexandro brabner' Alexandro moresone et gilberto prestone sergeando

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and Consale with Consent of the communite grantit to gif
Johne Cuk fourty Schillingis of thar' common gudis to pay be his hous' maile for his gude
seruice done to thame tymes bigane et cetera

Eodem die Accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator altaris
Sancti nicholaij de Abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Red
ditu sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam
terra vasta quondam Symonis masone Jacente infra dictum burgum in le
gastraw inter terram Johannis talyour ex australi et terram quondam mathei Wricht
ex boreali ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus
Alexandro moresone Alexandro brabner' et gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram magister Alexander fyf et protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu
ij s' et altarij nicholaij debito et non solito de quadam terra quondam Johannis hile vasta
in vici viridi prout super Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Alexandro brabner Alexandro moresone et gilberto prestone sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram thomas lammyntone protestabatur pro vno annuo Red
ditu ij s' sibi annuatim de quadam terra in futy prout in precedens curia capitali et cetera Ad quam
terram Accedens nichil reperit dsitringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis present in Curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus Testibus Nicholao bevmond' Andrea balcromy et Ormundo leslie sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus Johannes prat capellanus ac procurator Altarum Sancte Crucis et beatis
thome et georgei infra eccelsiam Sancti Nicholaij et protestbatur in forma Juris pro duobus
annuis Redditibus dictis altaribus et sibj debito videlicet xiij s' et iiij d' altarj sancte thome
et altarj sancte crucis de quadam terra vasta prout in precedenti Curia capellanorum Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus cristino prat Nicholao bevmond' et ormundo leslie
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir Johannes chamer capellanus altaris sanctj saluatoris infra
ecclesiam parochialem sancti nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s'
et octo denariorum monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non
soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Andree branche Jacente in vico nauium ex australi australi parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam Jacobj Kintor ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias versus boream et occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius processus testibus Andrea low Johanne fynne et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Curia gilde burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio burgi de aberdene
sexto die mensis Octobris Anno dominj millesimo quingentesimo tercio

Johne leslie of Warderis
sere Johne Ruthirfurde
Robert blinseile
Dauy menyheis
Alexander rede
Johne' of Cullane
Alexander chamer
gilbert menyeis
Androw cullane
Johne Wormet
alexander mar
Johne' Knollis
James colisoun'
Androw murray
Dauy mar
Robert crage
alexander gray
Williame futhes
Richerd' Waus
thomas waus
Duncane colisoun'
William Wormet
patry rede
mathow branch'

Evin quartar normonde leslie sergeand'
Willelmus loremer et alexander nory
Crukit quartar androw nauchty sergeand'
Johannes colly et Johannes glenny
grene quartar gilbert prestone sergeande
Nycholaus bevmonde et philipus clerk
ffuty quartar William scrimgeor sergeande
Alexander stabelar et gilbertus tulidef

Patricius leslie Johannes Duncanesone georgeus bisset Johannes Kintor Johannes
Willyongesoun' Duncanus portar Johannes annande Malcomus crage alexander malisoun'
Andreas stevinsone Willemus murray Johnanes falconar Johannes auchneyve
Andreas brekar' et symon' Elloun'

The said day Johne of murray lauchfully warnyt callit ande nocht com
perit to ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Johne leslie of warderis for the
wranguis' resat' of ane kist witht silkis extendinge to iijC merkis tharfor the balyes
ordanit gilbert prestoun' sergeande to pas ande tak ane distras of the said'
Johnes' ande lat It agane to borghe gif it be askyt ande warne him to
Comper' this day xv days to ansuer to the said borghe as secund day of
proces'

Eodem die Johannes leslie de warderis fecit constituit et ordianuit Johannem
mar et magistrum gilbertum leitht coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores
cum potestate substituendum dictum et concedens eisdem eorumque alterj et suis substitutis
suam Integram potestatem ad prosequendum dictum plegium super Johannem murray
paratum et in omnibus aliis actionibus suis promittentibus de rato et grato in vbe
riore forma proucratorij cum aliis clausis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Richardus redhed' legittime premunitus vocatus et non comparens
amerciatur responsure Johanne mar balliuo pro perturbio ipsius

Eodem die mariota sponsa Richardj redhed' amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex
ore Dauid menyes prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis mar balliuj in
execucionj suj officij et Idem ballivus quiet' de omnj perturbio dicte mariote
Cuj Iniunctim et diliberatum fuit per dictam assisam quod prefata mariota flexio
genibus ab eodem balliuo veniam poterit in curia Et si quicumque officiarium impostrum
perturbauerit et Inde conuicta fuerit soluet quinque marcas ad fabricem ecclesie

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die mensis octobris
anno quo supra

The said day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirmane bailyeis and diuers' of the
Counsale that the smythtis sale sele nay hors' schone' derrar nay tua d' iij d'
or iiij d' the scho and thai sale mak the j hors' scho for ane penny ande put It
one the hors' fut and thai sale haud ane penny for euery remove vnder the pane of
lawe and brekinge of common' ordanens

The saide day James hill follouyt sere Johne' ruthirufrde for the wranguis' occupacione'
of ane croft of his without assedacione' quhilk wrange the said' knycht denyt ande
offerit him to preiwe his tak ande assedacione and askit ane lauchfull day to preve
the sammyne' thareftir the aldirmane baileis assignyt to the saide knycht the xviij day
of the monetht of nouember nixt tocum to preiwe his tak of the saide croft befor
thame within the tolbutht' of the saide burghe'

The saide day the aldirmane ande diuers' of the counsale present for the tyme consentit
and ordanyt that Johne' ramsay salbe payt of the xxvij s' avinge to him for the
expensis made at the tovnis Commavnde apoun' certane Inglismene beinge with
the quhit ros' at the nixt taxit and that the said some salbe extentit and set in the
nixt taxt that happinnys generalie to be set apoun' the haile tovne'

The saide day the aldirmane and counsale present for the tyme promittit ande
grantit iiijor merkis to Williame byrne sangstar for this Instant yer to be pait
tile him for his gude seruice to be maide within thar paris' kirk of Aberdene'

The said day Duncane Craik oblist gim be his hande vpehaldinge that
he matho branche and Wrycht sale suer the grit bodely aitht quhat
the wairstall follouyt be sere Androw collisoun' was wortht and to pay the vtir waile
of it to the saide sere androw or ellis vpmak the said' wairstall als gude as
It was quhen' he Intrometit thar witht quhilkis salbe done betuix this ande
monunday nixt to cum

The saide day Williame Ramson oblist him tile Entir the man that trubulit
thome Narnis wif this day xv dais befor the aldirman and balyeis within
the tolbutht tile ansuer for the strubulance of the saide wif /

The saide day / gilbert patirsone grantit to pay to James Colisone xxti
s' in money within xv dais / Ande gif he pait nocht the said xx s' thank
fullie at the saide day / the saide James declarit he walde haue the haile
tua merkis that he was aving to him

Inquiscio facta Apud burgum de abidene Coram honorabilibus viris Alexandro menyes
preposito thoma leslie et Johanne ruthirfurde militem Robertum
blinsele Johnannem Cullane Alexandrum rede Jacobum Colisone Johannem Wormot
thomam Waus patricium rede Andream Cullane Richardum Waus Willelmum
Wormet Dauid mar' Duncanum Colisone Johannem stevinsone et geor
geum bisset burgensis dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Agnes gray
amica Andree avfray latoris presencium obiit vltra vestita et sasita ut
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente
infra dictum burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
quondam mathei Wricht ex australi ex vna et terram Willelmi futhes
ex boreali partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et
torrentem versus occidens Et quod dictus Andreas est legittimis et propin
quior heres dicte quondam Agnetis amice sue de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valet nunc per annum quinque solidos
Et valuit ij s' iij tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de
Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium et nunc existit
In manibus dominj nostri Regis per decessum dicte quondam agnetis per spa
cium duorum annorum aut eocirca In defectu verj heredis Jus
suum huiusque minime prosequentis datam et clausum sub Sigillo
dicti thome leslie balliuj ac Sigillis quorundam quj huic Inquisicionj
Intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The saide day the ballieis assignit wednisday the xj day of this
Instant monetht of Octobir to thome buchan to ansuer to the borghe'
fundin one be the procuratoris of george meldrum fischear' of fyve for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of iiijor barrellis of Salmonde and tua
barrellis of gerls'

The saide day Androw Aufray oblist him be his handis landis
and gudis quhatsumeuire Ande specialie be his lande that he now Inha
bitis and his gret croft liand' one the northt part of the common gat
passand to alde abirdene to warand' keip and defend' the said' assis'
quhilkis seruit the breiwe of Inquest of the lande of vmquhile
Anny gray liande in the gastrawe fra ale skatht trubule and Inquieta
cion' of ale persone or personis quhilkis may clame or haue entires'
tharto
